WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
In my application I create new AppDomains and each AppDomain has its own config file. When I use the generated code in an AppDomain different then the default one the "Instance" property returns null, other configurations (wcf, appsettings...) are working correctly.
 
Is this a bug or am I missing something?
 
Thanks,
Steven Hillaert
WorkItem.Summary: Instance returns null when used in different AppDomain

Comments.Message:
Hi Steven,

Sorry for getting back to you so late. I've tried out your scenario and couldn't reproduce it. I've created a separate AppDomain with a different config file, and in that AppDomain I call the "Instance" property - and it correctly returns a configuration instance I can use to read out the alternative config file...

Can you let me know more details or upload a sample so I can double check?

Thanks!

Jelle
